Html:
Hello together,

when i start the sample application i get follow error message for all projects in this solution:

Fehler	1	The command ""%PROGRAMFILES%\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v7.0\Bin\UICC.exe"  "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\01-AddingRibbonSupport\RibbonMarkup.xml" "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\01-AddingRibbonSupport\RibbonMarkup.bml" /res:"C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\01-AddingRibbonSupport\RibbonMarkup.rc"
"%PROGRAMFILES%\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v7.0\Bin\rc.exe" /v "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\01-AddingRibbonSupport\RibbonMarkup.rc"
cmd /c "("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\..\..\VC\bin\vcvars32.bat") && ("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\..\..\VC\bin\link.exe" /VERBOSE /NOENTRY /DLL /OUT:"C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\01-AddingRibbonSupport\bin\Debug\01-AddingRibbonSupport.ribbon.dll" "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\01-AddingRibbonSupport\RibbonMarkup.res")"
" exited with code 1.	01-AddingRibbonSupport

I use Windows7 68Bit and Visual C# 2008 Express Edition. Have anyone an idea why i get this message? 
Lars

Hi,

you have to install the Windows 7 SDK!

André

Thx for your help,

I have now installed the Window 7 SDK and get 2 new error messages

 

First message:

Fehler    3    cannot open input file 'C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\RibbonMarkup.res'    C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\LINK    02-ApplicationMenuButton

 

Second message:

Fehler    4    The command ""%PROGRAMFILES%\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v7.0\Bin\UICC.exe" "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\RibbonMarkup.xml" "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\RibbonMarkup.bml" /res:"C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\RibbonMarkup.rc"
"%PROGRAMFILES%\Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v7.0\Bin\rc.exe" /v "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\RibbonMarkup.rc"
cmd /c "("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\..\..\VC\bin\vcvars32.bat") && ("C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\..\..\VC\bin\link.exe" /VERBOSE /NOENTRY /DLL /OUT:"C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\bin\Debug\02-ApplicationMenuButton.ribbon.dll" "C:\Users\Lars\Desktop\RibbonLib_v2.0\Samples\02-ApplicationMenuButton\RibbonMarkup.res")"
" exited with code 1181.    02-ApplicationMenuButton

Lars

Check this discussion, probably the problem is related to 64bit:

http://windowsribbon.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=77456

Hello,

I have exactly the same problem as LarsThorwald described.
It is not caused by 64bit in my case, because I'm running XPsp2 x86.

Have you got any idea how to solve this?

Thanks,

Julo

Solved,

I didn't have c++ tools installed (in VS and SDK7). And I also didn't have XmlLite.dll, parser required by uicc.exe

Now ii does work!
